title: Shadewood armor
summaries: Shadewood armor is an armor set consisting of the Shadewood Helmet, Shadewood Breastplate, and Shadewood Greaves.

It is crafted solely from Shadewood harvested from Crimson Trees. It acts as the Crimson counterpart to the Corruption's Ebonwood armor, which shares the same stats. Along with its counterpart, it is the most powerful pre-Hardmode wooden set, though it still pales in comparison to most other armor sets. It requires 75 Shadewood to craft a full set.
Wearing a full set grants a set bonus of 1 additional defense, providing a total of 5 defense.
